text: Automobile Dacia S.A. is a Romanian car company. The company was founded in 1966, and has been a subsidiary of the French car manufacturer Renault since 1999. It is Romania's top company by revenue and the largest exporter, constituting 7.3% of the country's total exports in 2014. The Dacia manufacturing plant in Mioveni, Arge»ô County is Europe's fifth biggest car manufacturing facility by volume producing 584,219 units (cars and CKD kits) delivered in 2016 and 550,912 units in 2015. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Automobile brands Category:Automobile companies Category:1966 establishments in Europe Category:20th-century establishments in Romania Category:Organizations based in Romania
title: Automobile Dacia
